DOC.brief_summary: To compare effect ingest 100 , 50 10 calorie glucose compare non-calorie placebo ( 0 calorie beverage ) self-control resist snack food . To test whether threshold glucose result improve ease resistance problem food ( test compare three different level glucose ) .
DOC.brief_title: A Pilot Study : Snacking , Willpower Glucose Availability
DOC.detailed_description: Ingestion 100 calorie glucose individually pre-determined time wan dietary self-control result improve ease resistance problem food compare ingestion low calorie glucose placebo ( 0 calorie beverage )
DOC.criteria: 1 . Females age 18 65 year . 2 . Selfidentify regular snacker , specific problem food , trouble overconsuming snack food . 3 . Have intentionally lose weight last year seek maintain weight loss unintentionally gain weight last year concern . 4 . Generally healthy . 1 . Pregnant try become pregnant . 2 . Diagnosis type 1 type 2 diabetes 3 . Not willing able follow study guideline ( ie : consuming study beverage daily four week , complete daily compliance log ) 4 . Current smoker ( stop smoke within last 6 month ) 5 . Taking medication could cause weight loss weight gain ( steroid , tricyclic antidepressant , chemotherapy , antipsychotic , prescribe counter weight loss agent , etc ) . 6 . Current history eat disorder ( anorexia , bulimia , diagnose binge eat disorder ) 7 . Current alcohol drug abuse dependence 8 . Any medical condition daily snack problem food would inadvisable ( i.e . : subject hypertension advise avoid sodium ) .
